field_definition.name: Using
field_definition.description: To enable inheritance, enter the name of the parent entry. Parent needs to be defined above current line.

field_definition.name: Strength
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Finesse
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Intelligence
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Constitution
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Memory
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Wits
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute. 10 is roughly the amount that a dedicated player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Armor
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. 100 will give you average Armour amount for a heavy character of corresponding level.

field_definition.name: ArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value that will modify base Armour. E.g. -50 will halve current armour, 50 will produce 150% base armour. Helpful if you are inheriting and need 200% Armour compared to the parent.

field_definition.name: ArmorBoostGrowthPerLevel
field_definition.description: This parameter increases ArmorBoost by (Level-1)*param*0.1

field_definition.name: MagicArmor
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. 100 will give you average Armour amount for a heavy character of corresponding level.

field_definition.name: MagicArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value that will modify base Armour. E.g. -50 will halve current armour, 50 will produce 150% base armour. Helpful if you are inheriting and need 200% Armour compared to the parent.

field_definition.name: MagicArmorBoostGrowthPerLevel
field_definition.description: This parameter increases MagicArmorBoost by (Level-1)*param*0.1

field_definition.name: Vitality
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. 100 will give you average Vitality amount for a character of corresponding level.

field_definition.name: DamageBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. E.g. -30 will reduce all damage inflicted by this character by 30%.

field_definition.name: DamageBoostGrowthPerLevel
field_definition.description: This parameter increase DamageBoost by (Level-1)*param*0.1

field_definition.name: MagicPoints
field_definition.description: Maximum amount of Source Points the character can hold

field_definition.name: APStart
field_definition.description: AP granted at the start of combat.

field_definition.name: APRecovery
field_definition.description: AP restored each turn

field_definition.name: MPStart
field_definition.description: Source Points amount on character creation

field_definition.name: Movement
field_definition.description: Distance in centimeters per AP spent on movement in combat.

field_definition.name: MovementSpeedBoost
field_definition.description: Percentage value, 50 produces a character with 150% base Movement.

field_definition.name: Gain
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. E.g. level 3 character with '5' Gain will produce enough XP to cover 5% of experience needed to advance from level 3 to level 4.

field_definition.name: Weight
field_definition.description: In grams, relevant for some types of puzzles.

field_definition.name: PiercingResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: PhysicalResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: MaxResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Default cap is 200.

field_definition.name: FireResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: EarthResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: WaterResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: AirResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: PoisonResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: SingleHanded
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: TwoHanded
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Ranged
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: DualWielding
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Leadership
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: PainReflection
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Perseverance
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: RangerLore
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: FireSpecialist
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: WaterSpecialist
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: AirSpecialist
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Sourcery
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Necromancy
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Polymorph
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Summoning
field_definition.description: Enter a value in [0,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of ability. 10 is roughly the maximum amount that a player can gather at that level.

field_definition.name: Telekinesis
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Sneaking
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Civil Ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Thievery
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Loremaster
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Repair
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Barter
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Persuasion
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Luck
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value. Default civil ability cap is 5.

field_definition.name: Accuracy
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value

field_definition.name: Dodge
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value

field_definition.name: Using
field_definition.description: To enable inheritance, enter the name of the parent entry. Parent needs to be defined above current line.

field_definition.description: Enter a value in [-10,10] range. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of attribute.

field_definition.name: FireResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: EarthResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: WaterResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: AirResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: PoisonResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: PiercingResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: PhysicalResistance
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: Movement
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value in centimeters.

field_definition.name: MovementSpeedBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative.

field_definition.name: Vitality
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value. Potion will heal the character for Vitality amount provided by code. E.g. 100 is the standard heal amount for the level of the character.

field_definition.name: VitalityBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. E.g. '10' produces you +10% character's base maximum Vitality.

field_definition.name: VitalityPercentage
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Potion will heal the character for Vitality amount equal to the percentage of their maximum Vitality.

field_definition.name: Armor
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. Code will turn it into a flat bonus\malus. E.g. '50' produces half of an average Armour buff.

field_definition.name: ArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. This value modifies character's maximum Armour by a percentage. E.g. '10' produces +10% of character's maximum Armour.

field_definition.name: MagicArmor
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. Code will turn it into a flat bonus\malus. E.g. '50' produces half of an average Armour buff.

field_definition.name: MagicArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. This value modifies character's maximum Armour by a percentage. E.g. '10' produces +10% of character's maximum Armour.

field_definition.name: LifeSteal
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Any damage to Vitality that owner character inflicts will turn into a heal modified by this percentage value.

field_definition.name: Damage
field_definition.description: Enter an integer that corresponds to DamageSourceType enum and defines which damage curve to pick. E.g. 1 is average player damage.

field_definition.name: Damage Multiplier
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. It will modify base damage. 100(%) for average damage.

field_definition.name: Damage Range
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Base damage will be randomized in (base - halfRange,base + halfRange) interval.

field_definition.name: BonusWeapon
field_definition.description: Enter a stat name from Weapon file.

field_definition.name: Using
field_definition.description: To enable inheritance, enter the name of the parent entry. Parent needs to be defined above current line.

field_definition.name: Armor Defense Value
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of Armour, using 100 as average.

field_definition.name: ArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. Modifies base amount of Armour, '10' produces +10% of base.

field_definition.name: Magic Armor Value
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Code will turn it into level-appropriate amount of Armour, using 100 as average.

field_definition.name: MagicArmorBoost
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage value, can be negative. Modifies base amount of Armour, '10' produces +10% of base.

field_definition.name: Movement
field_definition.description: Enter a flat value in centimeters.

field_definition.name: Fire
field_definition.description: Enter a percentage resistance value.

field_definition.description: Enter a percentage resistance value.

field_definition.description: Enter an integer that corresponds to DamageSourceType enum and defines which damage curve to pick. E.g. 1 is average player damage.

field_definition.name: Damage Multiplier
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. It will modify base damage. 100(%) for average damage.

field_definition.name: Damage Range
field_definition.description: Enter a positive percentage value. Base damage will be randomized in (base - halfRange,base + halfRange) interval.

field_definition.name: Using
field_definition.description: To enable inheritance, enter the name of the parent entry. Parent needs to be defined above current line.
